Derived_data prepared and used for the analyses:

-   coords.tsv: Tomst infos and coordinates in Paracou
-   pad.tsv: plant area density voxels
-   sensors_pad_xy.tsv: correspondence tables between voxels and sensors coordinates
-   tomst.tsv: all aggregated Tomst data from Paracou
